short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track and manage job applications across multiple job boards. Automatically captures job details and organizes your job search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Quick Job Manager Extension is your ultimate companion in the job search process, designed to optimize and simplify each step along the way. With seamless integration into leading job portals, this Chrome extension offers a unique feature called "OnTheFly Resume." This tool enables you to generate job-specific resumes tailored to the positions you're applying for, increasing your chances of standing out to employers.

Elevate your job search strategy with Quick Job Manager Extension and turn every opportunity into a potential career advancement.
